name: PuzzlAR: FreePlay
description:
**Auggie Awards 2018 Finalist for Best Game or Toy**

**Best AR Mobile Game of 2017 by Next Reality**

=======

PuzzlAR: World Tour is a new twist to the classic jigsaw puzzles. Forget the flat pieces and be amazed to the tridimensional ones that will float right in front of you, over the real world. Through Augmented Reality you can grab, move and fit pieces to construct your very own Forbidden City, Statue of Liberty, Taj Mahal and Saint Basil Cathedral.

Each landmark will bring unique and iconic surroundings full of life, color and sound, that will allow you to travel the world as never before. Let yourself be amazed and bring your family and friends to have fun with you on this Augmented Reality experience.

Relax by choosing your difficulty level or, challenge yourself by getting the best score on worldwide leaderboards.


=======

"It's a 3D spatial puzzler - but played on your table! " - Pocket Gamer

"PuzzlAR dazzles with interface gameplay designed for AR" - Next Reality

"It’s really challenging and fun, you really have to try this out." - ARCritic

=======

ART STYLE
The PuzzlAR: World Tour visual style is inspired by Poly Art, to bring a fresh take on famous landmarks from around the globe.

EASY TO PLAY
Tap and drag floating puzzle pieces to construct your replicas. Designed with Augmented Reality in mind for a unique gameplay experience.

SECRETS
Look around the scenarios and search for all the secret medals. Can you find them all?

YOU CHOOSE
The next puzzle could be a monument from your town! Vote on the landmarks that you would like to see becoming a puzzle on the next updates.

AUDIO
Sounds from around the world that play simultaneously with the construction of each puzzle.

TRAVEL THE WORLD
Let our stunning levels transport you to the most beautiful landmarks in the world.

=======

Bica Studios team proudly presents its first Augmented Reality game, an exciting puzzle game experience, powered by ARKit. The team has been creating AR projects since 2015 and PuzzlAR: World Tour, it's the result of these years of experience and fun exploration on this incredible new medium. Join us on this ride! :)
